data.name: ReadAccrualInstructions
data.value: select top(1) OTR_TYPE, OTY_ID, OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_GENERATED_ID, AS_OF_DT, DISCONTINUE_DT from CKT_ACCRUAL_INSTR where (@otyId = OTY_ID) and (@obgGeneratedId = OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE)

data.name: ReadDebtDetail1
data.value: select top(1) OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_GENERATED_ID, OTY_TYPE, OTR_TYPE, DUE_DT, BAL_DUE_AMT, INT_BAL_DUE_AMT, RETIRED_DT, CREATED_TMST from CKT_DEBT_DTL where (@otyType = OTY_TYPE) and (@obgGeneratedId = OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE)

data.name: ReadDebtDetail2
data.value: select OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_GENERATED_ID, OTY_TYPE, OTR_TYPE, DUE_DT, BAL_DUE_AMT, INT_BAL_DUE_AMT, RETIRED_DT, CREATED_TMST from CKT_DEBT_DTL with(readuncommitted) where (RETIRED_DT = @retiredDt) and (@otyType = OTY_TYPE) and (@obgGeneratedId = OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE)

data.name: ReadObligation
data.value: select distinct T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.OB_ID, T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID, T1.LGA_ID, T1.PRIM_SEC_CD, T1.CREATED_TMST from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T5 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_OBLIGATION T1 with(readuncommitted) on (T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID <> 9) and (T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID <> 4) and (T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID <> 5) and (T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID <> 6) and (T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID <> 7) and (T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID <> 8) and (T1.CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (T5.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = T1.LGA_ID) and (T5.STANDARD_NO = @standardNo)

data.name: ReadObligationType
data.value: select top(1) DEBT_TYP_ID, DEBT_TYP_CLASS from CKT_OB_TYPE where DEBT_TYP_ID = @debtTypId
